definition: Data and information from a variety of sources is entered into the neural network through this layer.

definition: This layer processes data sent by the input layer or from other associated layers.

definition: In this layer, information from the previous layers is analyzed. After this analysis occurs, a final prediction or conclusion is made.
term: Output Layer
